1: <pb/><t>Ri Ajawaxel</t> <t>xubij che ri wajaw:</t> <t>“Chatt'uyul pa ri nu wiquiak'ab,</t> <t>c'ä quinban na</t> <t>chque ri qui banom qui c'ulel chawe</t> <t>chi quebux e u tac'alibal ri e awakan.”</t>
2: <pb/><t>Kas puwi' ri Sion,</t> <t>ri Ajawaxel cujach wi ulok</t> <t>ri bara' pa k'ab la,</t> <t>che u q'uexwäch ri cuinem la;</t> <t>¡chätakan ba la</t> <t>paquiwi' ri qui banom qui c'ulel che la!</t>
3: <t>Ri tinimit la cäjach na pa k'ab la</t> <t>chupam ri k'ij re ri ch'äcanic la.</t> <t>Paquiwi' tak ri tastalicalaj tak juyub,</t> <t>je c'ut jacha' ri räxk'ab</t> <t>ri cäq'uiy pa ri u sakaric,</t> <t>ri alc'ual la cac'ac'ar</t> <t>chi k'ij chi k'ij.</t>
4: <t>Ri Ajawaxel xuban jun chi'nic</t> <t>ri kas cäban na,</t> <t>man c'u caresaj ta rib chupam:</t> <t>“At, at cojol tabal tok'ob</t> <t>chbe k'ij sak,</t> <t>xak junam abantajic</t> <t>ruc' ri Melquisedec.”</t>
5: <pb/><t>Ri Ajawaxel c'o pa ri wiquiak'ab la;</t> <t>pa ri k'ij re ri royowal</t> <t>cusach na qui wäch ajawinelab;</t>
6: <t>cuk'at na tzij</t> <t>che u sachic qui wäch</t> <t>ri nimak tak tinimit,</t> <t>quebumuluba' na cäminakib,</t> <t>¡quebuc'äjij na jolomaj</t> <t>pa ronojel ri uwächulew!</t>
7: <t>Pa ri be cutij na joron</t> <t>pa jun alaj nima'</t> <t>ri joron cuya' na c'ac' u chuk'ab.</t>
